p: M. plutonius was the only strain where we could determine IC 50 values only, but not MIC or IC max. Slope of the growth curves were determined using a linear regression (between 2 days, one without and one with detectable bacteria, usually between days 2 and 3) and standard spreadsheet software. All following steps were the same as described above. Due to high variance among replicates, the median among replicates was used to estimate IC 50 values.
